title: Mastery in ARAM
body: I got an S in ARAM on a champion I had level 6 on and I didn't get a Mastery Token for Level 7. I had thought I was able to get a mastery token in ARAM or was I mistaken? {{champion:102}}

replies.body: Congrats on your prowess!  Tokens are currently only available in Summoner's Rift, per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  While you can still get grades in other modes, only tokens can be found there.  Hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ebEk4L8I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-19T16:47:38.487+0000)
>
> Congrats on your prowess!  Tokens are currently only available in Summoner's Rift, per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  While you can still get grades in other modes, only tokens can be found there.  Hope that helps clear things up!

It definitely does, thank you for the info and the guide!
